titleInfo.title: Letter from Sir Harford Jones, at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Sir Harford Jones, at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran], to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 1 November 1810 and informing that, in regard to Bruce's building a dwelling at Bushire, no building was to be erected by foreigners without the approval of the King of Persia and his allies, the East India Company and H M Government. Jones suggests that the King of Persia offers a compensation of 15,000 Piasters to Bruce.
